title: The Week of Ursula Richardson: Counselor by Day, Hero by Night
summary: Ursula Richardson, a 33-year-old counselor, discovers her ability to read minds within her consulting sessions, using it to unravel a local mystery and prevent a crime spree.
summaryGerman: Ursula Richardson, eine 33-jährige Beraterin, entdeckt ihre Fähigkeit, in Beratungssitzungen Gedanken zu lesen, und verwendet sie, um ein lokales Geheimnis zu lüften und eine Verbrechensserie zu verhindern.
summaryDutch: Ursula Richardson, een 33-jarige counselor, ontdekt haar vermogen om gedachten te lezen tijdens haar consultatiesessies, en gebruikt het om een lokaal mysterie te ontrafelen en een misdaadgolf te voorkomen.
summaryFrench: Ursula Richardson, conseillère de 33 ans, découvre sa capacité à lire dans les pensées lors de ses séances de consultation, l'utilisant pour élucider un mystère local et prévenir une série de crimes.

story.text: Ursula begins her week with a new client who seems distressed and erratic. While counseling, she surprisingly hears thoughts not spoken out loud, realizing she can read minds.
Emboldened by her new skill, Ursula probes deeper into her client's thoughts. She uncovers a plan involving a local crime ring.
Ursula discreetly informs the authorities about her discovery, carefully omitting her supernatural ability. She spends the evening strategizing her next steps.
During a follow-up session, Ursula subtly steers her client away from criminal intentions. Her gentle guidance leads to the client reconsidering their choices.
At a community event, Ursula senses whispers of the impending crime. She covertly intervenes, preventing an incident while blending into the crowd.
After a tense week, Ursula takes a well-deserved day off, reflecting on her actions and their impact on her community and personal moral code.
Validation comes when news breaks that the planned crime spree was averted. Ursula feels a deep sense of accomplishment, her secret safe and her city safer.

ending: By blending her professional expertise with her newfound abilities, Ursula not only changed lives but also safeguarded her community from shadows.
moral: With great power comes great responsibility.
